example.name: cite-v: transitive agentive
example.text: They cite a lack of imbalances that provide early warning signals of a downturn.
example.arg: a lack of imbalances that provide early warning signals of a downturn.

example.name: cite-v: with attribute
example.text: He cites the recent deal between Mitsubishi Estate Co and the Rockefeller Group as evidence.
example.arg: the recent deal between Mitsubishi Estate Co and the Rockefeller Group

example.name: citation-n
example.text: Scalia was correct in his citation of writer's work.

roles.note: These two senses can be difficult to distinguish, especially if it's acriminal misdeed that's being referred to. If you really can't tell, try to default to the"refer" sense, since that's less specific. (from cite.02-v)

example.name: cite-v: bummer dude
example.text: The Labor Department cited USX Corp for numerous health and safety violations at two Pennsylvania plants.
example.arg: for numerous health and safety violations at two Pennsylvania plants.

example.name: citation-n
example.text: My 13-year-old son got a citation for riding his bicycle without a helmet.
example.arg: for riding his bicycle without a helmet
